CustomField.description: A lookup of the Drift Conversation_Playbook Name field which replaces the null (-) value with “[No Playbook Associated]” to add more context to reports and dashboards.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A lookup of the Drift Conversation_Playbook Name field which replaces the null (-) value with “[No Playbook Associated]” to add more context to reports and dashboards.
CustomField.label: Playbook Name (Reports Only)
